data.text: @Joyce151515 @PateJohnC @BethMooreLPM Sorry again. Think maybe I was speaking on another train of thought. My point was not to put our hope in man. I did not intend to be critical of those who expose evil. By propaganda I meant I think we are getting misinformation from every direction...

@NotMyWords3 @PateJohnC @BethMooreLPM If you can't stand the Truth, just say so. I am not a propaganda person. I don't believe a single word from QAnon nor do I believe in some crazy interpretation of endtimes so much that I'll be OK with Christians who sabotage the Earth which God has asked us to be good steward in.

@Joyce151515 @PateJohnC @BethMooreLPM Good point, exposing wrong is not politics. But I also believe we have lost our focus. That does concern me. We need to return to simplicity in Christ...and know the truth revealed in His word.Not get muddled and divided in whose propaganda we side with.

@NotMyWords3 @PateJohnC @BethMooreLPM Didn't the men of God speak up against evil rulers many places in the Bible? It's our duty to make known wrong is wrong. If you point to the wrong and call it right and call the right wrong, that is politics!  So be careful, you should not call exposing the wrongs politics!
@Joyce151515 @PateJohnC @BethMooreLPM I breaks my heart how Christians have fallen into politics...Lord help us. 💔 our hope is in Him alone.
@BethMooreLPM @_ToddElliott So many false teachers in that line-up. 😐
@BethMooreLPM As long as their vaccinated right?

@PateJohnC @BethMooreLPM Many times I want to wear a baseball cap with these few words "Not Trump but Christ" going to church.  Wondering they will beat me up or not.  I'll have my phone ready or my friend's phone ready!
